description.value: Common among brutes who use the magic to scare others into compliance, menacing runes lend you a formidable appearance, granting you a +1 item bonus to Intimidation checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Coerce} others.

publication.title: Pathfinder Treasure Vault (Remastered)

description.value: Preserving runes are common among merchants and other travelers who are on the road for weeks or months at a time. Any non-magical food and drink inside a container with a preserving rune remains fresher for longer, taking ten times as long to spoil. This feature doesn't prolong the duration of alchemical items.

publication.title: Pathfinder Treasure Vault (Remastered)

description.value: Trackless runes are common among hunters and trappers, as well as thieves and anyone fleeing pursuit. While wearing trackless footwear, you have a +4 item bonus to the DC to track you. However, this bonus doesn't stack with the status bonus from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zlnXpME1T2uvn8Lr]{Vanishing Tracks}.

publication.title: Pathfinder Treasure Vault (Remastered)

description.value:
Preserving runes are common among merchants and other travelers who are on the road for weeks or months at a time. Any non-magical food and drink inside a container with a greater preserving rune never spoils. This feature doesn't prolong the duration of alchemical items.

Activate 2 (concentrate, manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect The container casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qXTB7Ec9yYh5JPPV]{Cleanse Cuisine} on all the food and drink within.

publication.title: Pathfinder Treasure Vault (Remastered)

description.value: Footwear with pontoon runes allows you to traverse waterways with ease. While wearing footwear with the rune, you can walk on the surface of water and other liquids without falling through. This offers no protection against damage the liquid deals. You can go under the liquid's surface, but you must Swim if you do.

publication.title: Pathfinder Treasure Vault (Remastered)

description.value:
Common among brutes who use the magic to scare others into compliance, menacing runes lend you a formidable appearance, granting you a +2 item bonus to Intimidation checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tHCqgwjtQtzNqVvd]{Coerce} others.

Activate 2 (concentrate, manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect The rune casts a 3rd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear} spell (DC 25).

publication.title: Pathfinder Treasure Vault (Remastered)

description.value:
Trackless runes are common among hunters and trappers, as well as thieves and anyone fleeing pursuit. While wearing trackless footwear, you have a +4 item bonus to the DC to track you. However, this bonus doesn't stack with the status bonus from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zlnXpME1T2uvn8Lr]{Vanishing Tracks}.

Activate 2 (concentrate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You extend the effect of your rune out to a @Template[emanation|distance:20]. The emanation remains for 8 hours, affecting up to 10 creatures of your choice within the area. You can Dismiss this effect.

publication.title: Pathfinder Treasure Vault (Remastered)

description.value:
With this rune, you can instantly retrieve an item in your possession without digging around looking for it.

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per hour

Requirements You have a free hand and the called item is in a bag, pack, pouch, or other container on your person, or unattended within 30 feet

Effect The item teleports to a free hand.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens The Grand Bazaar

description.value: A garment with this rune is always clean, as though it had just been affected by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Qw3fnUlaUbnn7ipC]{Prestidigitation}. You gain a +1 item bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on those who would be impressed by a particular presentable outfit while wearing this garment.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens The Grand Bazaar

description.value: This animated item attempts to catch you when you fall. You can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Grab an Edge}, even if your hands are tied behind your back or otherwise @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, so long as there's a solid edge within 10 feet. If you roll a success, you can Grab the Edge even if you don't have a hand free.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens The Grand Bazaar

description.value:
This item creates a small cushion of air that catches you when you fall. You treat falls as 10 feet shorter.

Activate r envision

Frequency once per day

Trigger You begin to fall

Effect You gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Gentle Landing} for 1 minute or until you stop falling, whichever comes first.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens The Grand Bazaar

description.value: Merchants traveling into Stonebreach sometimes apply this accessory rune to specific wares to avoid the notice of thieves. Conversely, many thieves in Highhelm apply these runes to stolen goods to help them smuggle items out of the city. The item gains the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.PRrZ7anETWPm90YY]{Disguise Magic} to appear as non-magical. The rune's effects also cause anyone who closely observes or holds the item to believe it is a mundane version of that type of item, such as believing a magical dagger to be an ordinary dagger, unless the creature succeeds at a @Check[will|dc:18] save. Creatures that succeed their save see that there is more to the item than meets the eye, but aren't immediately aware of the magic aura effect.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens Highhelm

description.value:
This rune depicts a specific type of dragon, resizing after application to fit the surface of the item.

Activate f envision (spellshape)

Requirements You're receiving a bonus to AC from your dragon's breath cape or shield

Effect If your next action is to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} with an area of effect that deals the same type of damage as the depicted dragon's breath weapon, the spell gains the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.FoWO4RnHRwfEIC7Q]{Widen Spell} feat. The rune can only affect spells of 1st level.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens The Grand Bazaar

description.value:
These runes always come in pairs and can be applied to a garment's pockets to be activated.

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per day

Requirements The paired items are both invested, typically by two different characters, and are within 100 feet of each other

Effect Items in the pockets (up to 10 negligible Bulk items or 1 light Bulk item per pocket) trade places via teleportation.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens The Grand Bazaar

description.value:
This rune depicts a specific type of dragon, resizing after application to fit the surface of the item.

Activate f envision (spellshape)

Requirements You're receiving a bonus to AC from your dragon's breath cape or shield

Effect If your next action is to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} with an area of effect that deals the same type of damage as the depicted dragon's breath weapon, the spell gains the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.FoWO4RnHRwfEIC7Q]{Widen Spell} feat. The rune can only affect spells of 2nd level or lower.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens The Grand Bazaar

description.value: This rune is invested by the captain or pilot of the vehicle. The vehicle gains a +5-foot item bonus to its Speed. If lack of wind prevents the vehicle from moving, it can still move at a Speed of 5 feet.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens The Grand Bazaar

description.value:
These runes always come in pairs and can be applied to a garment's pockets to be activated.

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per day

Requirements The paired items are both invested, typically by two different characters, and are within 1 mile of each other

Effect Items in the pockets (up to 10 negligible Bulk items or 1 light Bulk item per pocket) trade places via teleportation.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens The Grand Bazaar

Activate 2 envision, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{Suggestion}.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens The Grand Bazaar

description.value:
These runes always come in pairs and can be applied to a garment's pockets to be activated.

Activate 1 command

Frequency once per day

Requirements The paired items are both invested, typically by two different characters, and are on the same plane as each other

Effect Items in the pockets (up to 10 negligible Bulk items or 1 light Bulk item per pocket) trade places via teleportation.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens The Grand Bazaar

description.value: This rune is invested by the captain or pilot of the vehicle. The vehicle gains a +10-foot item bonus to its Speed. If lack of wind prevents the vehicle from moving, it can still move at a Speed of 10 feet.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens The Grand Bazaar

mapping.applied-to-any-item-of-light-or-negligib: Item of Light or Negligible Bulk
